entry.title: Lifewalk
entry.content: Curiosity will lead you to places, but to make it there you have to stick in there.
entry.summary: Curiosity will lead you to places, but to make it there you have to stick in there.

entry.title: Light
entry.content: We still have to see beyond what lies, may we get to, what fun would reside. Thus, we struggle through this mud that engulfs, we sleep,we jump within this prism of dirt. One day, we might see the end or not, but we keep lit the fire, that we hold.
entry.summary: We still have to see beyond what lies, may we get to, what fun would reside. Thus, we struggle through this mud that engulfs, we sleep,we jump within this prism of dirt. One day, we might see the end or not, but we keep lit the fire, that we hold.
